## Functions

### findWLS() {#ac80c82ab5623016f11bc128c6a943af6}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static MachineInstr &#42; findWLS (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineloop">MachineLoop</a> &#42; ML)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Find WhileLoopStart in the loop predecessor BB or otherwise in its only predecessor.

If found, returns (BB, WLS Instr) pair, otherwise a null pair.

<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Revert a WhileLoopStart to an equivalent DoLoopStart and branch. Note that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// because of the branches this requires an extra block to be created.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/armblockplacement/#a977d1a0dea04c7f562cb1ca6063d81dd"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/armblockplacement/#a977d1a0dea04c7f562cb1ca6063d81dd">ARMBlockPlacement::revertWhileToDoLoop</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;WLS) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   lr = t2WhileLoopStartTP r0, r1, TgtBB</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   t2Br Ph</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// -&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   cmp r0, 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   brcc TgtBB</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// block2:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   LR = t2DoLoopStartTP r0, r1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   t2Br Ph</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Checks if loop has a backwards branching WLS, and if possible, fixes it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This requires checking the predecessor (ie. preheader or it&#39;s predecessor)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// for a WLS and if its loopExit/target is before it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// If moving the predecessor won&#39;t convert a WLS (to the predecessor) from</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// a forward to a backward branching WLS, then move the predecessor block</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// to before the loopExit/target.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/armblockplacement/#ab273671903c0baabbbf098a0a4581101"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/armblockplacement/#ab273671903c0baabbbf098a0a4581101">ARMBlockPlacement::fixBackwardsWLS</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineloop">MachineLoop</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3ad01fd9b01e9dde8bd3dc247afbfb7218">ML</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;WlsInstr = <a href="#ac80c82ab5623016f11bc128c6a943af6">findWLS</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3ad01fd9b01e9dde8bd3dc247afbfb7218">ML</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!WlsInstr)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; <a href="#a1c9d15f8ccd4a52a7f0bf4f24db139bd">DEBUG&#95;PREFIX</a> &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Found a backwards WLS from &quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlight">                    &lt;&lt; Predecessor-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ad2a8da74fd4e4c892018c56c977addee">getFullName</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; to &quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlight">                    &lt;&lt; LoopExit-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ad2a8da74fd4e4c892018c56c977addee">getFullName</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Make sure no forward branching WLSs to the Predecessor become backwards</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// branching. An example loop structure where the Predecessor can&#39;t be moved,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// since bb2&#39;s WLS will become forwards once bb3 is moved before/above bb1.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bb1:           - LoopExit</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bb2:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      WLS  bb3</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bb3:          - Predecessor</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      WLS bb1</span></CodeLine>
